All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ArabicNumberGenerator
Class for Roman to Arabic numerals conversion.
Controller
Main class of the program, it acts as the intermediary between the class Model and the class View so the proper separation between logic and user interface is implemented.
InvalidCharacterException
Own exception class for handling invalid user inputs.
Loader
Class that uses the Class Model and the Class View objects and has all the communication functions between the MVC pattern classes.
Model
Model handles the data processing and storing and has all the methods used to process it.
RomanNumeralGenerator
Class for Arabic to Roman numerals conversion.
View
A class that handles the UI in the console.
